name: Restaurant Tycoon
description:
Restaurant Tycoon is a simulation of Restaurant games, where you can hire employees, build restaurant, add furniture, through their own ability to make the restaurant profitable, become the most popular restaurant.


Features
  • Completely customized hotel design, you can design your unique hotel.
  • Real staff management system, employee recruitment is no longer easy.
  • More updates for free in the future.


If you have any comments or suggestions on any aspect of the game, you can contact the author directly, so that we can make progress together and achieve win-win situation.
